comment: Obsolete version of ~ sbimdv as of 6-Jul-2023. Deduction substituting both sides of an implication, with ` ph ` and ` x ` disjoint. See also ~ sbimd . (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 6-May-2023.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
